title: Cannot open league launcher
body: As soon as I try to open of the League of Legends launcher a pop up appears and says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and only give me an option to close it. I was wondering if anyone else is having this problem?

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are typically caused by the client not running with certain administrative privileges it requires to access software packages it relies on. I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

**This is the problem I had and the solution that fixed it!**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
When I double clicked on the "League of Legends" icon on my desktop, I instantly received an error message,

"PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"

Then there was only one option to click which was "Close Program"

I uninstalled LoL and attempted to reinstall it through league's official website, but again I still received the same error message,

"PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"

So this is what I did to fix it.....

1. Create a shortcut of LoL on your desktop 
2. Right click on it
3. Click "run as administrator"

But if that doesn't work for you try...

1. Create a shortcut of LoL on your desktop 
2. Right click on it
2. Click on properties
3. Click on compatibility
4. Click "run this program in compatibility mode for" and select your windows
5. Click "run as administrator"
6. Apply and okay

You could try all the window's options in #4 if the one you chose doesn't work for you.

Now again remember this is the problem I had and the solution that fixed it for me!

GOOD LUCK AND GODSPEED IN GOLD TIER!
